title: Episode 32: Why You Need Rest
description:
We’ve been conditioned to always be on the go or to always be productive. Sometimes we feel guilty for resting, but rest is an important part of healing. We all need downtime to just “be” without any agenda. In this episode, we talk about rest as an act of self care.
